Corporate Culture Audit

Corporations and businesses experience internal crises every day across the United States. Sometimes it’s an isolated incident, but repetitive patterns could be indicative of a much larger issue and an internal audit is warranted.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”tel:3179511100″ button_text=”We Can Help: (317) 951-1100″ button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”13px” button_text_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.8)” button_bg_color=”#ffba60″ button_border_width=”12px” button_border_color=”#ffba60″ button_border_radius=”0px” button_letter_spacing=”4px” button_font=”|700||on|||||” button_icon=”$||divi||400″ locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” button_border_radius__hover=”0px” button_border_radius__hover_enabled=”on” button_letter_spacing__hover=”4px” button_letter_spacing__hover_enabled=”on”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Welcome Section” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”11px||1px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”||12px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”Prata||||||||” header_font_size=”48px” header_2_font=”Prata||||||||” header_2_font_size=”40px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

What is Corporate Culture?

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”88%” max_width=”70%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”0px||10px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_divider color=”#ffa40d” divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” _builder_version=”4.16″ max_width=”70px” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”17px” text_line_height=”1.5em” max_width=”505px” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”|64px|5px|||” custom_padding=”2px|||||” animation_direction=”left” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Corporate culture is the manifestation of the relationship between leadership and their employees. It is sometimes referred to as organizational culture. It concerns how policies and communication from the top of a corporation can directly influence the level of employee engagement and satisfaction at multiple levels of an organization. When a company’s management does not show initiative to improve operations surrounding these types of complaints, it can create a culture of silence & resentment within the workforce. Healthy corporate culture creates a cycle of satisfaction and productivity that both benefits the bottom line and improves employee engagement for a balanced, stream of operations. When your corporate culture has declined significantly, an internal audit is necessary.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://lauthinveststg.wpengine.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/pie-chart.png” alt=”Corporate Culture” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”36px|||||” animation_style=”slide” animation_duration=”1400ms” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Welcome Section” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”3px||26px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”88%” max_width=”70%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”7px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||20px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.4″ text_font_size=”17px” text_line_height=”1.5em” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

The root of non-engagement from employees can often be traced back to problems within the organization. Sometimes it is as simple as employees feeling undervalued by their leadership. It can be more serious in other cases like that of a harasser or bully on your team that creates a hostile workplace culture. With our corporate culture audit program, your organization or corporation can identify the risks within your structure that directly threaten your prosperity. A corporate culture audit can be a treasure trove of information for leadership on how to improve your corporation from within for a better future. We provide expert recommendations that can improve your corporation from within and correct the cycle of corporate culture.

There are many types of internal crisis that can be prevented with a company culture audit. When a company’s management does not show initiative to improve operations surrounding these types of complaints, it can create a culture of silence & resentment within the workforce. Healthy corporate culture creates a cycle of satisfaction and productivity that both benefits the bottom line and improves employee engagement for a balanced, stream of operations. A cultural audit aims at improving this corporate culture.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Project Section 01″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”rgba(175,175,175,0.17)” custom_padding=”10px||19px|||” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” make_equal=”on” admin_label=”Project Area 01″ module_class=” et_pb_row_fullwidth” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”90%” width_tablet=”80%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” max_width=”89%” max_width_tablet=”80%” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”2px|auto||auto||” custom_padding=”||5px|||” make_fullwidth=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Prata||||||||” header_2_font_size=”32px” header_2_line_height=”1.6em” custom_margin=”||10px|” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”5%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Corporate culture is a melting pot of:

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”2em” custom_padding=”5px||42px||false|false” animation_style=”fade” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

  • Employee life, work experiences and expectations
  • Executive influence within the organization
  • Corporate policies and procedures
  • Management expectations
  • Employee and consumer relationships
  • Your legacy

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Prata||||||||” header_2_font_size=”32px” header_2_line_height=”1.6em” custom_margin=”||10px|” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”5%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Have you had your Culture Check Up?

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”2em” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”]

  • Organizational Mission, Values, and Vision
  • Is everyone invested in the same things?
  • Value differences between the Organization and Competitors
  • Identification of Key Measures of Success
  • Leadership in place vs. Leadership required
  • The behaviors and attitudes needed and in place
  • Strategic Influences in the Environment which may impact behaviors
  • Cultural Heritage since the founding of the company
  • Identification of Subcultures and their roles in the organization

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”9px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Prata||||||||” header_2_font_size=”40px” header_2_line_height=”1.6em” custom_margin=”||10px|” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”5%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Did you know?

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.1em” header_3_line_height=”1.3em” animation_style=”fade” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Toxic work environments and job stress cost employers $300 billion every year in the United States.

– Eastern Kentucky University’s Online Bachelor of Science in Occupational Safety program

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Project Section 01″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”5px||27px|||” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”||2px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Prata||||||||” header_2_font_size=”40px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” custom_margin=”||10px|” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”5%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Are you getting an accurate picture of
your company’s culture?

What we offer for our CCA

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ffa40d” divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” _builder_version=”4.16″ max_width=”70px” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” admin_label=”Service Area” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”90%” max_width=”90%” module_alignment=”center” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Business Consultation” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||divi||400″ icon_color=”#ffba60″ image_icon_width=”42px” content_max_width=”100%” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ header_font=”Roboto Slab||||||||” header_font_size=”20px” header_line_height=”1.8em” body_font=”||||||||” body_font_size=”16px” body_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”fade” hover_enabled=”0″ icon_font_size=”42px” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Every company needs a periodical internal audit, because every audit is an opportunity for businesses to identify their underlying problems and then implement solutions that will promote productivity and growth. We will evaluate your corporation’s organizational culture and provide you with solutions for the future.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Security Consultation” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”~||divi||400″ icon_color=”#ffba60″ image_icon_width=”42px” content_max_width=”100%” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ header_font=”Roboto Slab||||||||” header_font_size=”20px” header_line_height=”1.8em” body_font=”||||||||” body_font_size=”16px” body_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”fade” hover_enabled=”0″ icon_font_size=”42px” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Retaining a private investigator may sound like an unconventional avenue, but the results will speak for themselves. Using the same toolbox that they use for background checks and undercover operations; private investigators can come into a business and conduct a thorough investigation without disrupting daily operations.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Corporate Law Consultation” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”i||divi||400″ icon_color=”#ffba60″ image_icon_width=”42px” content_max_width=”100%” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ header_font=”Roboto Slab||||||||” header_font_size=”20px” header_line_height=”1.8em” body_font=”||||||||” body_font_size=”16px” body_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”fade” hover_enabled=”0″ icon_font_size=”42px” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

In-house counsel works hard to protect your business in legal matters, but sometimes that can be the source of the issue. Lauth evaluates your litigation process to identify cracks in the system and provides expert recommendations to fortify your legal fortress.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Why Choose Us Section” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_enable_color=”off” Do you have an accurate picture of your company’s culture?

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ffba60″ divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” _builder_version=”4.16″ max_width=”70px” custom_margin=”||35px|” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” animation_intensity_slide=”5%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”Roboto Slab||||||||” header_3_line_height=”1.4em” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin=”|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” animation_intensity_slide=”5%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Moral and Teamwork

Our investigators evaluate all personnel operations from hiring to termination. They identify risk factors within the process and current personnel, as well as identify subcultures within the workforce and how they contribute to the organization’s mission.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”Roboto Slab||||||||” header_3_line_height=”1.4em” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin=”|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” animation_intensity_slide=”5%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Engaged Learning and Environment

When employees are not engaged, they negatively contribute to the flow of productivity within the business. Our investigators identify issues both within leadership and lower-level employees. We provide effective, practical solutions that properly motivate employees to give 110% in their corporate capacity.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”Roboto Slab||||||||” header_3_line_height=”1.4em” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin=”|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” animation_intensity_slide=”5%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Positive Behavior and Leadership

The cycle of healthy corporate culture begins with healthy leadership. At Lauth, we believe positive leadership can overcome most issues within the cycle of corporate culture. That’s why we provide leadership with expert recommendations to reduce their stress and increase their output.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Our Philosophy Section” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#f7f7f7″ custom_padding=”4px||0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row admin_label=”Our Philosophy Area” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”45px||3px|||” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Prata||||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_font_size=”48px” header_2_line_height=”1.6em” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||-6px|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”fade” header_2_font_size_tablet=”40px” header_2_font_size_phone=”” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our Corporate Culture Audit Process

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ffa40d” divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” _builder_version=”4.16″ max_width=”70px” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||19px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.4″ text_line_height=”1.5em” header_3_font=”||||||||” header_3_font_size=”17px” header_3_line_height=”1.6em” width_tablet=”” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”|119px||124px||” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” width__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Our Corporate Culture Audit Program is customizable to a company or organization
of any size, and provides three different levels of investigation to fit your corporate needs.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ admin_label=”Our Philosophy Area” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”slide” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Number” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”Roboto Slab|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#2a2a2a” text_font_size=”36px” custom_margin=”||40px|” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Level 1

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”Roboto Slab||||||||” header_3_line_height=”1.4em” custom_margin=”||10px|” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”5%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We begin by fully evaluating internal processes by conducting interviews with leadership, relevant personnel, and a survey of brick & mortar sites and/or intra-corporate platforms of communication. We identify the most pervasive, top-priority issues and providing leadership with recommendations for growth.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_delay=”100ms” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Number” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”Roboto Slab|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#2a2a2a” text_font_size=”36px” custom_margin=”||40px|” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Level 2

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”Roboto Slab||||||||” header_3_line_height=”1.4em” custom_margin=”||10px|” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”5%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

When an imminent threat is identified, Lauth investigators use their full tool chest of investigative prowess to conduct interviews, gather evidence, and draw a conclusion to assist leadership in removing malignant factors from their internal operations.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_delay=”200ms” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Number” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”Roboto Slab|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#2a2a2a” text_font_size=”36px” custom_margin=”||40px|” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Level 3

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”Roboto Slab||||||||” header_3_line_height=”1.4em” custom_margin=”||10px|” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”5%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Active Shooter Training is education every brick-and-mortar business should consider, especially when there are personnel or security issues that might proceed an imminent threat of workplace violence. Lauth’s qualified team of instructors empower leadership and employees alike with the knowledge they need to feel safe and secure in their daily capacities.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Fun Fact Section” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”17px||6px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ admin_label=”Fun Fact Area” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ excerpt.rendered: Corporate Culture Audit Corporations and businesses experience internal crises every day across the United States. Sometimes it’s an isolated incident, but repetitive patterns could be indicative of a much larger issue and an internal audit is warranted.What is Corporate Culture?Corporate culture is the manifestation of the relationship between leadership and their employees. It is sometimes […]
